price: Maka barang siapa mengada-adakan kebohongan terhadap Allah132) setelah itu, maka mereka itulah orang-orang zalim.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ
footnotes: 132) Dusta terhadap Allah ialah dengan mengatakan bahwa sebelum Taurat diturunkan, Allah telah mengharamkan beberapa makanan kepada Bani Israil.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: famani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba min baʿdi dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna
